;Avenue-based Triple-Tile NWM Networks

;6-lane Avenue (AVE-6)
;Base Stub Overrides
0x51210180,0,0,0x04007300,0,1=0x51210180,0,0,0x51200100,0,1
0x51210180,2,0,0x04007300,2,0=0x51210180,2,0,0x51200100,2,0

;Base Intersection Overrides

;Street +
0x51211080,1,0,0x04008300,0,0=0x51211080,1,0,0x51201000,1,0
0x51211080,3,0,0x04008300,0,0=0x51211080,3,0,0x51201000,1,0

;Road +
